member.name: P:C1.Win.ExpressionEditor.C1ExpressionEditor.DataSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the object used as the data source.

member.name: P:C1.Win.ExpressionEditor.C1ExpressionEditor.DataMember
member.summary: Gets or sets the specific list in a object that the grid should display.

remarks.para: If a contains multiple sources of data, you should set the property to one of the sources.
For example, if the DataSource is a contains three tables named Customers, Orders, and OrderDetails, you must specify one of the tables to bind to.
If the contains only one , you may set the DataMember property to an empty string.
